caption.p: Joint analysis of m6A methylation and mRNA expression in MH7A cells after stimulation with TNF-Î±. ( A) Four quadrant graph of genes with differential m6A methylation and differentially expressed mRNA levels. ( B) Venn diagram of genes with differential m6A methylation and differentially expressed mRNA levels. ( C) PPI of genes with differentially expressed m6A methylation and differential expressed mRNA. ( D) The top 30 GO enrichments of genes with differentially expressed m6A methylation and differentially expressed mRNA in MH7A cells. ( E) The top 30 pathway enrichments of genes with differentially expressed m6A methylation and differentially expressed mRNA in MH7A cells.
